text: Valentino S.p.A. is an Italian luxury fashion house founded in 1960 by Valentino Garavani and part of the Valentino Fashion Group. The company has its registered office in Milan. Its cosmetic line, Valentino Beauty license is owned by L'Oreal Group. ==References== Category:Italian fashion houses Category:Companies based in Milan Category:1960 establishments in Europe Category:1960s establishments in Italy
title: Valentino (fashion house)
